thread.title: BRIEF-Enstar To Acquire Full Ownership Of KaylaRe

title: BRIEF-Enstar To Acquire Full Ownership Of KaylaRe

organizations.name: brief-enstar to acquire full ownership of kaylare reuters

text:
February 5, 2018 / 2:12 PM / in 18 minutes BRIEF-Enstar To Acquire Full Ownership Of KaylaRe Reuters Staff 
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Enstar Group Ltd: * ENSTAR TO ACQUIRE FULL OWNERSHIP OF KAYLARE * ENSTAR GROUP LTD - DEAL FOR APPROXIMATELY $400 MILLION 
* ENSTAR GROUP LTD - ‍HILLHOUSE AND STONE POINT WILL EXCHANGE THEIR RESPECTIVE 44% AND 8% SHAREHOLDINGS IN KAYLARE FOR ENSTAR SHARES​ 
* ENSTAR GROUP - STONE POINT WILL INCREASE ECONOMIC INTEREST IN CO FROM 6.9% TO 7.6% AND ITS VOTING INTEREST FROM 8.2% TO 9.1% 
* ENSTAR GROUP LTD - ‍HILLHOUSE WILL INCREASE ITS OVERALL ECONOMIC INTEREST IN ENSTAR FROM 9.9% TO 17.1% AND ITS VOTING INTEREST FROM 3.3% TO 9.7%​ 
* ENSTAR GROUP LTD - ‍SIGNED AN AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE A FURTHER 52% STAKE IN KAYLARE HOLDINGS LTD​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
